description:
如果你一直都很享受你的英语课，而且你也知道学习英语时保持一个愉悦的心态多么重要，那么请继续保持下去。如果你不是这样的状态，那么现在是时候开始尝试着去享受英语学习过程了。如果你缺少动力，那么现在请来阅读这些小妙招来帮助自己成为一个积极的英语学习者。

1. Read 阅读

Read as much as you can in English. No matter what it is, from cartoons to British literature anything counts.尽可能多的阅读英文。任何有价值的文本都可以，漫画，英国文学都可以。

Naturally if you wish to develop I would recommend you to choose something that provides you a challenge. So subscribe to your favorite English magazine or go online! 当然，如果你想继续发展，我建议你选择一些有挑战性的文本。所以现在就去读你最喜欢的英文杂志或者上网去浏览吧。

2. Immerse 专注

Understanding British or American culture can be a part of language learning. There are a lot of expressions that can be understood and remembered better if you know a couple of customs, behavioral patterns, books or poems.理解英美文化是英语学习的一部分。如果你了解一些英美习俗，行为举止，书籍或者是诗集，那么有一些表达就很容易被理解和记住了。

It is always fascinating to realize that you understand a short story, a text or even longer pieces of art in English. 理解一个短篇故事，一个文本，甚至是更长的英文作品，这总是让人着迷。

3. Share 分享

Where and how, you might ask. Well there are many ways to do this. You can start your own blog in English about your hobby, travel experiences or anything that interests you.你可能会问，在哪里分享，怎么分享。有很多分享的方法。你可以用英文写自己的博客分享爱好，旅行经历或者任何你感兴趣的东西。

If you don’t feel like writing, read others’ blogs or articles and feel free to comment if you have a question! You can also try to find an online community that has the same interest as you where you can share your own ideas, thoughts and beliefs. 如果你不喜欢写博客，那就去读其他人写的博客或者是文章，如果你有问题，那就去评论。你也可以尝试寻找一个与你有同样兴趣的在线社区，分享你自己的想法，想法和信仰。

4. Dare 挑战

This usually seems to be the most difficult part, but you have to conquer yourself! If you find yourself in a situation where you have the chance to use English grab it!这似乎是最困难的部分，但你必须征服你自己!如果你发现自己有机会说英语，一定要抓住它!

You must overcome your fears that you might speak incorrectly, and you can also ask your partner to correct you. So whenever you travel or meet foreigners don’t forget to speak as much as you can! 你必须克服自己的恐惧，不要害怕说错，当然你也可以让伙伴纠正你。因此，无论何时，当你旅行或者是遇到外国人的时候，要尽可能多的说英语。

5. Relax 放松

Never forget the power of relaxation! You don’t always have to force yourself to study if you are tired. You can also listen to some music, watch a movie or listen to an audio book (in English of course). It doesn’t sound too difficult does it? 永远不要忘记放松的力量！如果你累了，你不需要强迫自己去学习。你可以听音乐，看电影或者是听有声图书（当然，是英文版）。这听起来并不难，是吧？

Have you had any problems during learning English? What did you do to overcome them? Do you enjoy the procession of English learning? 你在学习英语的过程中有什么问题吗？你做什么来克服它们？你享受学习英语的过程吗？
